alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Drew; Jefferson; Lincoln (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 4:05PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Cleveland, northwestern Drew, south central Jefferson and Lincoln Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 405 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pine Bluff to 6 miles east of Kedron to near Rison. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pine Bluff... Star City... Rison... Grady... Nebo... Feenyville... Whitefield... Plantersville... Cane Creek State Park... Kedron... Woodville... Toledo... Herbine... Tarry... Cornerville... Tamo... Palmyra... Rose Hill... Crigler... Sarassa... This includes Interstate 530 between mile markers 42 and 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southeastern Arkansas.
